data.question: What is the empirical formula of MOF-177?
What method was used for the synthesis of MOF-177?
What is the crystal system of MOF-177?
What is the space group of MOF-177?
What is the temperature range used for SQUID measurements of Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177?
What is the weight ratio of Y2@C79N in Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177 according to ICP-AES test results?
What is the role of MOF-177's pores in relation to Y2@C79N molecules?
data.answer: The pores in MOF-177 crystal play a significant role in accommodating and dispersing the Y2@C79N molecules.

data.question: Is the paramagnetic property of Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177 single crystals independent of the Y2@C79N loading amount?
Does the Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177 complex exhibit antiferromagnetic-like behavior around 125 K?
Was the Y2@C79N synthesized using an arc-discharging method?
Is the crystal system of MOF-177 cubic?
Does the Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177 complex show isotropic ESR spectra at room temperature?
Is the space group of MOF-177 P2/c?
What is the Curie constant for Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177 complex in the temperature range 260 < T < 300 K?
What is the role of π–π interactions in the orientation of Y2@C79N molecules within MOF-177?
data.answer: The π–π interactions help to align Y2@C79N molecules along the c axis of MOF-177 crystal.

data.question: What is the effect of temperature on the ESR spectra of Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177?
data.answer: The ESR spectra exhibit axisymmetric hyperfine splitting at or below 213 K, indicating an orientational state of Y2@C79N molecules.

data.question: Does the Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177 complex have a higher BET surface area compared to pristine MOF-177?
What is the significance of the axisymmetric paramagnetic system in Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177?
data.answer: It indicates that the Y2@C79N molecules have directivity inside the matrix of MOF-177 crystal.

data.question: What is the method used for the encapsulation of Y2@C79N into MOF-177?
data.answer: The Y2@C79N molecules were encapsulated into MOF-177 by immersing MOF-177 crystals in a toluene solution of Y2@C79N for several days.

data.question: Is the magnetic moment transition for Y2@C79N molecules observed only in Y2@C79N⊂MOF-177?
